question.title: How to add one day to the enddate (date format) in API
question.body:
We currently updating enddate for a user from the Saviynt application to Active Directory through API.

So now I have a requirement to add one day to the enddate inside API and pass to active directory.

Below the attribute mapping we are passing:

"accountExpires": "${
if((user.employeeType.equals('Contractor')) & (user?.enddate!=null))
{10000*(user?.enddate.getTime()+11644473600000+18400000)} 
else {'0'}}"

ENDDATE format is : Mar 03, 2022 00:00:00

Now I needs to add one day to this in above mapping. May I know how can I do this requirement?
